page.title: 11TOURISM - HOLIDAY PARKS
page.content:
The magnificent sands, sea and surf of Holywell Bay has made this a most popular tourist area. Catering mainly for caravanning and camping, there are 4 holiday parks and bed and breakfast accommodation in some private residences.
{The Holywell Bay Holiday Park}has l57 caravans and 6 chalets, with 67 touring pitches. All static accommodation has T.V. Facilities include camp club, with bar and entertainment, toilet/shower block, launderette, shop and take-away food. There are 4 public telephone boxes, an amusement arcade and a heated outside swimming pool.
